page.title: 19RHUALLT YOUTH CLUB.
page.content:
There is a local "Youth Club" in the village,held in the chapel schoolroom. This operates every Friday _ the times being, 6.00p.m._ 7.30p.m.(For the young children) and 7.30p.m._ 9.00p.m. (For the older children/ teenagers).
Activities include Table-tennis,Darts, Snooker,Stilts,Walks,Toys,occasional Trips,Records,Football,Rounders,and Netball(Organised on the school field) Discotheques are also organised at the local hotel/restaurant.Parties are organised at Christmas.
A small number of parents run this club,assisted by the local policeman. Attendance,by village children,is very good. Some children from the outlying areas/villages also take advantage of this facility.
